author: felicity
msg: bug 3992: speed increase for RegistrarBoundaries::split_domain().  Instead of doing everything with regexp, use a hash and slightly alter how we find the domain.  Cuts out all the backtracking involved with the RE version, testing shows ~20% speed increase.

author: mss
msg: Added some sane fallbacks for an unset $HOME in ArchiveIterator.  Contrary to the short discussion on dev@ did I not put this into Util.pm as we actually should not use $HOME anywhere in the code because we tend to change $< in spamd.
